name: palladium to generic market for metal catalyst for catalytic converter | metal catalyst for catalytic converter | Cutoff, U
description:
ecoQuery: https://ecoquery.ecoinvent.org/3.10/cutoff/dataset/21381/documentation

This activity links palladium to the generic market for metal catalyst for catalytic converter. All metals that enter this market provide the function of a metal catalyst for use in a catalytic converter.;The product "metal catalyst for catalytic converter" should be used only in cases where the specific metal catalyst is not known. Three metals are commonly used as metal catalysts in catalytic converters: palladium, platinum and rhodium. Their function is to reduce the amount of toxic exhaust emissions from the combustion of fuels.

The activity starts with the reception of palladium.

The activity ends with the renaming of palladium to a generic metal catalyst, which supplies the market for metal catalyst for catalytic converter. As this is a renaming activity, no other inputs or outputs are included.
